4. "A Quiet Place" (2018) - This movie takes place in a post-apocalyptic world where creatures that hunt by sound have wiped out much of humanity. It follows the story of a family who must navigate this dangerous world in silence to survive. It's a tense and suspenseful film that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

"The Witch" (2015) - This historical horror movie is set in 17th-century New England and follows the story of a family who are banished from their Puritan plantation and struggle to survive in the wilderness. It's a slow-burning and unsettling film that explores themes of fear, superstition, and the consequences of religious intolerance.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful and enjoy watching one of these movies!
